mapper.insert:
insert into bi_relation_template (guid, templateid, templatename, templatetype, structuremodel, bmguid, viewclassguid, structureclassguid, end1boname, ISRECORDHASEND2, FIELDFORRECORDHASEND2, end2interface,
end2type, maxquantity, isincorporatedmaster, revisetrigger, saveastrigger, revisecopyrelation, saveascopyrelation,
checkintrigger, checkouttrigger, traschkouttrigger, cancelchkouttrigger, changelocationtrigger, deletetrigger,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime, isvalid, title ) values (#GUID:VARCHAR#, #TEMPLATEID:VARCHAR#, #TEMPLATENAME:VARCHAR#, #TEMPLATETYPE:VARCHAR#, #STRUCTUREMODEL:VARCHAR#, #BMGUID:VARCHAR#, #VIEWCLASSGUID:VARCHAR#, #STRUCTURECLASSGUID:VARCHAR#, #END1BONAME:VARCHAR#, #ISRECORDHASEND2:VARCHAR#, #FIELDFORRECORDHASEND2:VARCHAR#, #END2INTERFACE:VARCHAR#,
#END2TYPE:VARCHAR#, #MAXQUANTITY:NUMERIC#, #ISINCORPORATEDMASTER:VARCHAR#, #REVISETRIGGER:VARCHAR#, #SAVEASTRIGGER:VARCHAR#, #REVISECOPYRELATION:VARCHAR#, #SAVEASCOPYRELATION:VARCHAR#,
#CHECKINTRIGGER:VARCHAR#, #CHECKOUTTRIGGER:VARCHAR#, #TRASCHKOUTTRIGGER:VARCHAR#, #CANCELCHKOUTTRIGGER:VARCHAR#, #CHANGELOCATIONTRIGGER:VARCHAR#, #DELETETRIGGER:VARCHAR#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, '1', #TITLE:VARCHAR# )
mapper.select:
select b.*, (select m.classname from ma_class m where m.guid = b.viewclassguid) viewclassname, (select m.classname from ma_class m where m.guid = b.structureclassguid) structureclassname from bi_relation_template b
order by b.templatename, b.templateid

select b.*, (select m.classname from ma_class m where m.guid = b.viewclassguid) viewclassname, (select m.classname from ma_class m where m.guid = b.structureclassguid) structureclassname from bi_relation_template b
and b.isvalid = #ISVALID#
and b.end1boname in #TEMP#
and b.end2interface = #END2INTERFACE#
order by b.templatename, b.templateid

select distinct a.templatename from bi_relation_template a
and a.isvalid = #ISVALID#
and a.structuremodel in #TEMP#
and 1 = 2
and a.end1boname in #TEMP#
and a.templatetype = #TEMPLATETYPE#
and a.bmguid in #TEMP#
order by a.templatename

select distinct a.templatename from bi_relation_template a
and a.isvalid = #ISVALID#
and a.end1boname in #TEMP#
and a.templatetype = #TEMPLATETYPE#
and a.bmguid in #TEMP#
order by a.templatename
select count(1) end2count from $STRUCTABLE$ a where a.viewfk = #VIEWGUID#
mapper.update:
update bi_relation_template
updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, TEMPLATEid=#TEMPLATEID#, TEMPLATEname=#TEMPLATENAME#, templatetype=#TEMPLATETYPE#, structuremodel=#STRUCTUREMODEL#, bmguid=#BMGUID#, viewclassguid=#VIEWCLASSGUID#, structureclassguid=#STRUCTURECLASSGUID#, end1boname=#END1BONAME#, a.ISRECORDHASEND2=#ISRECORDHASEND2#, a.FIELDFORRECORDHASEND2=#FIELDFORRECORDHASEND2#, end2interface=#END2INTERFACE#,
end2type=#END2TYPE#, maxquantity=#MAXQUANTITY#, isincorporatedmaster=#ISINCORPORATEDMASTER#, revisetrigger=#REVISETRIGGER#, saveastrigger=#SAVEASTRIGGER#, revisecopyrelation=#REVISECOPYRELATION#, saveascopyrelation=#SAVEASCOPYRELATION#,
checkintrigger=#CHECKINTRIGGER#, checkouttrigger=#CHECKOUTTRIGGER#, traschkouttrigger=#TRASCHKOUTTRIGGER#, cancelchkouttrigger=#CANCELCHKOUTTRIGGER#, changelocationtrigger=#CHANGELOCATIONTRIGGER#, deletetrigger=#DELETETRIGGER#,
isvalid=#ISVALID#, title=#TITLE#,
where guid = #GUID#
update bi_relation_template set updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, isvalid = '0' where TEMPLATEname = #TEMPLATENAME#
mapper.delete: delete from bi_relation_template where guid = #GUID# and templatetype = '1'
delete from bi_relation_template where templatename = #NAME# and templatetype = '1'
mapper.select:
select distinct x.*, (select m.classname from ma_class m where m.guid = x.viewclassguid) viewclassname, (select m.classname from ma_class m where m.guid = x.structureclassguid) structureclassname from bi_relation_template x, bi_relation_template_end2 y where x.guid = y.masterfk and y.bmguid =#BMGUID# and x.ISVALID = #ISVALID#
and y.end2boname in #TEMP#
order by x.templatename, x.templateid
SELECT a.* FROM bi_relation_template a WHERE guid=#guid#
